sessions.title: Well-Architected Framework: Best Practices
sessions.description: Apply the AWS Well-Architected Framework to your applications. Review operational excellence, security, reliability, performance efficiency, cost optimization, and sustainability pillars.
speakers: Lisa Martinez, Principal Solutions Architect, AWS

sessions.title: Zero Trust Security on AWS
sessions.description: Implement zero trust security models using AWS services. Explore identity verification, least privilege access, micro-segmentation, and continuous security monitoring strategies.
speakers: David Kim, Sr. Security Engineer, AWS

sessions.title: HIPAA Compliance on AWS: Architecture Best Practices
sessions.description: Build HIPAA-compliant healthcare applications on AWS. Learn about BAA requirements, PHI data protection, audit logging with CloudTrail, encryption strategies, and compliance automation.
speakers: Dr. Rachel Park, Healthcare Solutions Architect, AWS

sessions.title: Amazon Aurora: Global Database at Scale
sessions.description: Build globally distributed databases with Amazon Aurora. Learn about Aurora Global Database, read replicas, failover strategies, and performance tuning for multi-region applications.

sessions.title: Healthcare Data Security: Encryption and Key Management
sessions.description: Protect sensitive healthcare data with AWS encryption services. Master AWS KMS, CloudHSM, encryption at rest and in transit, and key rotation strategies for HIPAA workloads.

sessions.title: Multi-Region Active-Active Architectures
sessions.description: Design globally resilient applications with active-active multi-region architectures. Learn data replication strategies, traffic routing patterns, and disaster recovery best practices.

sessions.title: Database Migration Strategies for Healthcare Providers
sessions.description: Migrate legacy healthcare databases to AWS with minimal downtime. Explore AWS DMS, Schema Conversion Tool, data validation, and compliance maintenance during migration.
speakers: Patricia Rodriguez, Database Migration Specialist, AWS

sessions.title: AWS IAM: Advanced Access Control Patterns
sessions.description: Master AWS Identity and Access Management with advanced patterns. Explore permission boundaries, service control policies, cross-account access, and least privilege design.

sessions.title: Architecting for Healthcare Interoperability: FHIR on AWS
sessions.description: Build interoperable healthcare systems using FHIR standards on AWS. Learn about Amazon HealthLake, API integration patterns, and data normalization strategies.
speakers: Dr. Emily Zhang, Healthcare Architect, AWS
Robert Lee, Sr. Solutions Architect, AWS

sessions.title: Disaster Recovery Strategies on AWS
sessions.description: Design comprehensive disaster recovery solutions on AWS. Compare backup/restore, pilot light, warm standby, and multi-site active/active DR strategies.

sessions.title: Patient Data Privacy: AWS Best Practices
sessions.description: Implement comprehensive patient data privacy controls. Explore data anonymization, consent management, access logging, and breach notification automation on AWS.
speakers: Dr. Amanda Foster, Privacy Solutions Architect, AWS

sessions.title: DynamoDB: Single-Digit Millisecond Performance
sessions.description: Build high-performance applications with Amazon DynamoDB. Explore partition key design, global secondary indexes, DynamoDB Streams, and capacity planning.

sessions.title: AWS Security Hub: Centralized Compliance Monitoring
sessions.description: Automate security and compliance monitoring with AWS Security Hub. Learn continuous compliance checks, automated remediation, and integration with AWS Config and GuardDuty.
speakers: Mark Johnson, Security Automation Lead, AWS

sessions.title: Serverless Architectures for Healthcare Applications
sessions.description: Build HIPAA-eligible serverless applications with AWS Lambda, API Gateway, and DynamoDB. Learn event-driven patterns, cost optimization, and security best practices.
speakers: Nina Patel, Healthcare Solutions Engineer, AWS
